title: 1960s-80s logo font
author: metalfoot

comments.content: A very similar font would be Eurostile Bold Extended.
Certainly a contender would be Linotype's Microgamma

Microgramma Bold Extended looks really close... might be a digitized vs print difference... then again, so does Eurostile Bold Extended... and I have Square721 BT (part of the fonts that came with WordPerfect) so that will do quite nicely! Doesn't need to be an exact match, just close enough for my purposes.
So thanks to both of you!
